info.name: VET_Smoke_Test_Scripts
info.description:
1) CRUD operations for /VET/loadlocal

  Validations Checks

 - success code is 201 for POST at /VET/loadlocal
 - success code is 204 or 200 for DELETE at
   /VET/loadlocal
 - error code is 404 for non existant valid loadlocal 
   DELETE at /VET/loadlocal
 - "id object exists in response"
 - "name object exists in response"
 - "model_input object exists in response"
 - "upload object exists in response 
 - "loadlocal is uploaded on correct S3 server"

2) CRUD operations for /VET/QuoteEng 

    *Incorporated Python notebook sceanrio*

   - Step 1 - Create a new loadlocal file using  /VET/loadlocal endpoint.

   - Step 2 - Use the newly created loadlocal filename to run the POST at /VET/QuoteEng. Only changing fields in the request payload are as below. Rest are hardcoded valid values sent from Sugumar.

	'loadlocal'
	'pv_configuration.Shortname'
	'model_input_shortname'

    - Step 3 - Delete the newly created loadlocal file

  Validations Checks

 - success code is 201 for POST at /VET/QuoteEng
 - imports_before object exists in response
 - imports_after object exists in response
 - bills object exists in response
 - fineng_output object exists in response
 - error code is 400 for POST at /VET/QuoteEng with
   empty loadlocal file.
 - error code is 400 for POST at /VET/QuoteEng with
   valid but non existant loadlocal file.

request.description:
This request is a POST request to /VET/loadlocal/ endpoint.
Here upload field accepts multipart/form data
Only required field here is name.

item.name: POST loadlocal WITH AN EXISTING NAME

request.description:
This request is a POST request to /VET/loadlocal/ endpoint.
Here upload field accepts multipart/form data
Only required field here is name.

item.name: POST loadlocal WITH AN EMPTY UPLOAD

request.description:
This request is a POST request to /VET/loadlocal/ endpoint.
Here upload field accepts multipart/form data
Only required field here is name.
Returns the collection of model_input objects.
Returns the model_input object collection for specific page

item.name: GET loadlocal FOR VALID PAGE NUMBER

request.description: Return model_input object collection for a valid page.

item.name: GET loadlocal FOR INVALID PAGE NUMBER

request.description: Returns 404 not found response for invalid page
Returns 404 page not found error as invalid object does not exists.

item.name: DELETE loadlocal WITH VALID EXISTANT ID
GET loadlocal FOR VALID NON EXISTENT ID

request.description: Returns 404 page not found error as the input is valid but not in existence anymore.

item.name: DELETE loadlocal WITH VALID NON EXISTANT ID

request.description: Creates a new loadlocal object with 2 required inputs i.e. 1) name 2) upload file path
